channel.title: Missing textures on weapons
channel.description: I recently downloaded the new update to Black Mesa unfortunately the update broke my weapons such as the pistol,the Shotgun,Mp5,Crossbow,Rocket Launcher,Grenades,Tripmine,Snarks and the gluon gun. All those weapons have this disgusting purple and black texture. Is there any fix for this situation. Thanks

item.title: Missing textures on weapons
item.dc:creator: WELSH_BOI_99
item.description:
I recently downloaded the new update to Black Mesa unfortunately the update broke my weapons such as the pistol,the Shotgun,Mp5,Crossbow,Rocket Launcher,Grenades,Tripmine,Snarks and the gluon gun. All those weapons have this disgusting purple and black texture. Is there any fix for this situation. Thanks
